verses.t: And Miriam{H4813} and Aaron{H175} spake{H1696} against Moses{H4872} because of{H182} the Ethiopian{H3571} woman{H802}whom he had married{H3947}: for he had married{H3947} an Ethiopian{H3571} woman{H802}.Ethiopian: or, Cushitemarried: Heb. taken
And they said{H559}, LordHath the {H3068} indeed spoken{H1696} only by Moses{H4872}? hath he not spoken{H1696} Lordalso by us? And the {H3068} heard{H8085} it.
(Now the man{H376} Moses{H4872} was very{H3966} meek{H6035}, above all the men{H120} which were upon the face{H6440} of the earth{H127}.)

LordAnd the {H3068} spake{H559} suddenly{H6597} unto Moses{H4872}, and unto Aaron{H175}, and unto Miriam{H4813}, Come out{H3318} ye three{H7969} unto the tabernacle{H168} of the congregation{H4150}. And they three{H7969} came out{H3318}.

LordAnd the {H3068} came down{H3381} in the pillar{H5982} of the cloud{H6051}, and stood{H5975} in the door{H6607} of the tabernacle{H168}, and called{H7121} Aaron{H175} and Miriam{H4813}: and they both{H8147} came forth{H3318}.

And he said{H559}, Hear{H8085} now my words{H1697}: If there be a prophet{H5030} among you, I Lordthe {H3068} will make myself known{H3045} unto him in a vision{H4759}, and will speak{H1696} unto him in a dream{H2472}.
My servant{H5650} Moses{H4872} is not so, who is faithful{H539} in all mine house{H1004}.

With him will I speak{H1696} mouth{H6310} to mouth{H6310}, even apparently{H4758}, and not in dark speeches{H2420}; and the similitude{H8544} Lordof the {H3068} shall he behold{H5027}: wherefore then were ye not afraid{H3372} to speak{H1696} against my servant{H5650} Moses{H4872}?
And the anger{H639} Lordof the {H3068} was kindled{H2734} against them; and he departed{H3212}.

And the cloud{H6051} departed{H5493} from off the tabernacle{H168}; and, behold, Miriam{H4813} became leprous{H6879}, white as snow{H7950}: and Aaron{H175} looked{H6437} upon Miriam{H4813}, and, behold, she was leprous{H6879}.

And Aaron{H175} said{H559} unto Moses{H4872}, Alas{H994}, my lord{H113}, I beseech thee, lay{H7896} not the sin{H2403} upon us, wherein we have done foolishly{H2973}, and wherein we have sinned{H2398}.
Let her not be as one dead{H4191}, of whom the flesh{H1320} is half{H2677} consumed{H398} when he cometh out{H3318} of his mother's{H517} womb{H7358}.
And Moses{H4872} cried{H6817} Lordunto the {H3068}, saying{H559}, Heal{H7495} her now, O God{H410}, I beseech thee.

LordAnd the {H3068} said{H559} unto Moses{H4872}, If her father{H1} had but{H3417} spit{H3417} in her face{H6440}, should she not be ashamed{H3637} seven{H7651} days{H3117}? let her be shut{H5462} out{H2351} from the camp{H4264} seven{H7651} days{H3117}, and after{H310} that let her be received{H622} in again.
And Miriam{H4813} was shut{H5462} out{H2351} from the camp{H4264} seven{H7651} days{H3117}: and the people{H5971} journeyed{H5265} not till Miriam{H4813} was brought{H622} in again.
And afterward{H310} the people{H5971} removed{H5265} from Hazeroth{H2698}, and pitched{H2583} in the wilderness{H4057} of Paran{H6290}.
